title: TCS | Civil Engineer Journey
content:
Education: B.Tech ( Civil )Tier 5
Years of Experience: 6 months (Intern)
Date of the Offer: DEC 2022
Company: TCS
Title/Level: Assistant Systems Engineer - Trainee
Location: PAN India
Salary: INR 3,36,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Bonus: upto INR 60,000 on the basis of performance in TCS Xplore Program during the first year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 3.36 LPA
Benefits: Quarterly Bonus based on performance, Health and Life Insurance, Food Card worth 500 per month
Exam Deatils : Through TCS NQT (New Integrated Test Pattern)

title: Canopus intern
content:
Education: B.Tech in Information Technology
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Fresher
Company: 13k during internship
Title/Level: Trainee Software Developer
Location: Indore India
Salary: INR 3.6LPA 
Relocation: NO
Signing Bonus: INR 2000
Stock bonus: NO
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 8-10% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 3000-6000
Benefits: 15 paid vacation days + 10 paid sick leave days + 10 holidays + 2 paid personal days + yearly sports stipend of INR 3000 to spend on sports stuff or free gym membership
Other details: Negotiated once, original offer did not have signing bonus. Was given a week to accept or decline the offer.
